item.title: Sublime SFTP package
item.description: I’ve become an addicted fan of the Sublime Text editor. This is the most amazing text editor I’ve worked with. It’s been already greatly described in other blogs (see, for example here and here), so I am not going into the details about it’s cool features. What I want to write about is one it’s packages which I find particularly useful — Sublime SFTP. This package is very convenient if you run your jobs on a remote machine or a computational cluster.
